content: "Omne vivum, sapientia temporum." <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, thank you for your patience.
info: 参观万象馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Through this way lies the Aquarium, and it's now open to visitors. The creatures you gave to me to settle here are looking forward to meeting you.
info: 参观万象馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}Welcome to the <style=Highlight>Omni-Gallery</style>, a comprehensive facility integrating research, collections, preservation, conservation, exhibitions, and more.
info: 参观万象馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: I will continue my biological research here. If you discover any new creatures, feel free to bring them to me and I'll <style=Highlight>settle</style> them. I'll be waiting for you <ruby:in the Main Hall>right here</ruby>.
info: 参观万象馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3
参观万象馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}Feel free to drop in for a visit whenever you like. I'll be waiting for you <ruby:in the Aquarium>inside</ruby>.
info: 参观万象馆-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: {A害羞挠头}Ahem. Now, allow me to present the first part of the Omni-Gallery — the <style=Highlight>Aquarium</style>.
